mapper.sql: id, name, description, category_id, seller_id, cover,score,sales_volume, status, price,is_deleted
mapper.select:
select tg.id, tg.name, tg.description, category_id, seller_id, tg.cover, score,sales_volume, price, location from takeout_goods as tg join takeout_seller ts on ts.id = tg.seller_id where province = #{province} and city = #{city} and tg.id = (SELECT id FROM takeout_goods WHERE tg.seller_id = seller_id and price != 0 and status = 1 and is_deleted = 0
order by score desc
order by price asc
LIMIT 1)

select id, name, description, category_id, cover, price, ifnull(score, ifnull((select avg(score) from takeout_goods_evaluate where takeout_goods_evaluate.goods_id = takeout_goods.id) / 5 * 100, 0)) as score, ifnull(sales_volume, ifnull((select SUM(quantity) from takeout_order_item where order_code in (select code from takeout_order where takeout_order.seller_id = takeout_goods.seller_id)), 0)) as sales_volume, (select COUNT(*) from takeout_basket where takeout_basket.seller_id = takeout_goods.seller_id) as basketNum from takeout_goods where status = 1 and is_deleted = 0 and seller_id = #{sellerId}
and category_id = #{goodsCategoryId}
